00037     class GLDefaultHardwareVertexBuffer : public HardwareVertexBuffer 
00038     {
00039     protected:
00040         unsigned char* mpData;
00042         void* lockImpl(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00044         void unlockImpl(void);
00045 
00046     public:
00047         GLDefaultHardwareVertexBuffer(size_t vertexSize, size_t numVertices, 
00048             HardwareBuffer::Usage usage);
00049         ~GLDefaultHardwareVertexBuffer();
00051         void readData(size_t offset, size_t length, void* pDest);
00053         void writeData(size_t offset, size_t length, const void* pSource,
00054                 bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00056         void* lock(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00058         void unlock(void);
00059 
00060         //void* getDataPtr(void) const { return (void*)mpData; }
00061         void* getDataPtr(size_t offset) const { return (void*)(mpData + offset); }
00062     };
00063 
00065     class GLDefaultHardwareIndexBuffer : public HardwareIndexBuffer
00066     {
00067     protected:
00068         unsigned char* mpData;
00070         void* lockImpl(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00072         void unlockImpl(void);
00073     public:
00074         GLDefaultHardwareIndexBuffer(IndexType idxType, size_t numIndexes, HardwareBuffer::Usage usage);
00075         ~GLDefaultHardwareIndexBuffer();
00077         void readData(size_t offset, size_t length, void* pDest);
00079         void writeData(size_t offset, size_t length, const void* pSource,
00080                 bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00082         void* lock(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00084         void unlock(void);
00085 
00086         void* getDataPtr(size_t offset) const { return (void*)(mpData + offset); }
00087     };
00088 
00096     class GLDefaultHardwareBufferManager : public HardwareBufferManager

00099         GLDefaultHardwareBufferManager();
